edu.umich.auth.cosign
Class CosignConfig

java.lang.Object
  edu.umich.auth.cosign.CosignConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class CosignConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This class is the in-memory configurations of the Cosign filter. It reads in the Cosign configuration file and monitor any change in it.

Author:
htchan
